prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Piano, Guitar, Bass, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Bass, but no Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Bass, omitting Chromatic Percussion.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Piano, Guitar, Bass, excluding Chromatic Percussion.
